job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Apple Media Products, Apps
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtThe Apple Media Products Engineering team is one of the most exciting examples of Apples longheld passion for combining art and technology These are the people who power the App Store Apple TV Apple Music Apple Podcasts and Apple Books And they do it on a massive scale meeting Apples high expectations with high performance to deliver a huge variety of entertainment in over 35 languages to more than 150 countriesltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThese engineers build secure endtoend solutions They develop the custom software used to process all the creative work the tools that providers use to deliver that media all the serverside systems and the APIs for many Apple servicesltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThanks to Apples unique integration of hardware software and services engineers here partner to get behind a single unified vision That vision always includes a deep commitment to strengthening Apples privacy policy one of Apples core values Although services are a bigger part of Apples business than ever before these teams remain small nimble and crossfunctional offering greater exposure to the array of opportunities hereltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtStrong programming and debugging skills in JavaltbrgtltbrgtJavaScriptReact for front end developmentltbrgtltbrgtPython TensorFlowPyTorchKeras for application of ML modelsltbrgtltbrgtKnowledge of Swift or ObjectiveC a bonus but not requiredltbrgtltbrgtExperience in building consumerfacing singlepage applications in JavaScript ES6 HTMLCSSltbrgtltbrgtExperience with developing rich interactive and wellperforming user interfaces using frameworks like ReactltbrgtltbrgtWorking experience with RDBMSampampNoSQL technologies like PostgreSQLCassandraltbrgtltbrgtDocker and Kubernetes for internal cloud infrastructureltbrgtltbrgtExcellent writing and interpersonal skillsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWe dont expect prior experience with all the technologies involved but you will be encouraged to learn to use them optimallyltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtYou will work together with Server ML and client engineers owning all the components of our stack operations and product teams to implement infrastructure and add product features vital for our effortsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtWe are looking for a full stack engineer to solve challenging problems for App Store review This role will be responsible for developing software to deploy ML models analyze apps submitted to the App Store and visualize the output Your efforts in the team will help ensure the quality of apps in the store and will benefit millions of customers You will be expected to help integrate models implement software and infrastructure that will run them and process their output Creative engineers will benefit from the chance to convert forward thinking ideas all the way from prototype to final product with the help of a great engineering and infrastructure teamltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtDay to day duties but not limited toltbrgtltbrgtDesign implement and evolve web applicationsltbrgtltbrgtBuild a flexible ML service platform that can be easily customized toward different use casesltbrgtltbrgtCollaborate with multifunctional teams of engineers data analytics Machine Learning specialists and products to build new featuresltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBS in Computer Science or equivalent work experienceltbrgtltbrgtMS or PhD in computer vision machine learning computer science a bonusltbrgtltbrgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200195505ltbrgtltbrgt
